text: Ani granthadharakampaiki kahi loka avasya ase aheta je allahavara imana rakhatata ani je tumacyavara utaravile gele ahe ani je tyancyakade utaravile gele ahe tyavara imana rakhatata. Allahace bhaya balaguna rahatata, ani allahacya ayatinna thode thode mola ghe'una vikata nahita1 tyanca mobadala tyancya palanakartyajavala ahe. Nihsansaya allaha lavakaraca hisoba ghenara ahe
